languages.text: {n}Старуха неторопливо протягивает Джай запечатанный свиток.{/n} "Вот ваша грамота, госпожа Хейдари. К сожалению, пока она не имеет силы — я смогу заверить сей священный документ лишь после того, как вы проставите две печати одобрения. Исполнить сие несложно — в Империуме этим уже больше полусотни лет занимаются придворные администратумы-сервиторы. Один обитает здесь, на Даргонусе, во дворце Вольного Торговца. Второй же обязан хранить печать в системе Теликос Эпсилон".

traits.locale_text: {n}Старуха неторопливо протягивает Джай запечатанный свиток.{/n} "Вот ваша грамота, госпожа Хейдари. К сожалению, пока она не имеет силы — я смогу заверить сей священный документ лишь после того, как вы проставите две печати одобрения. Исполнить сие несложно — в Империуме этим уже больше полусотни лет занимаются придворные администратумы-сервиторы. Один обитает здесь, на Даргонусе, во дворце Вольного Торговца. Второй же обязан хранить печать в системе Теликос Эпсилон".

languages.text: {n}The old woman unhurriedly holds out a printed scroll to Jae.{/n} "Here is your document, Mistress Heydari. Unfortunately, it does not yet have legal force — I can certify it as a sacred Mercatum Tabula Officiale once it has received two seals of approval. They are easy to obtain — in the Imperium court Administratum servitors have been handling such tasks for over fifty years. There is one such servitor here on Dargonus in the Rogue Trader's palace. The second is duty-bound to keep the seal in the Telikos Epsilon System."

Второй же обязан хранить печать в системе Теликос Эпсилон".

Unfortunately, it does not yet have legal force — I can certify it as a sacred Mercatum Tabula Officiale once it has received two seals of approval. They are easy to obtain — in the Imperium court Administratum servitors have been handling such tasks for over 150 cycles. There is one such servitor here on Dargonus in the Rogue Trader's palace. The second is duty-bound to keep the seal in the Telikos Epsilon System."

Unfortunately, it does not yet have legal force — I can certify it as a sacred Mercatum Tabula Officiale once it has received two seals of approval. They are easy to obtain — in the Imperium court Administratum servitors have been handling such tasks for over 150 cycles. There is one such servitor here on Dargonus in the Rogue Trader's palace. The second is duty-bound to keep the seal in the Telikos Epsilon System."

languages.text: {n}老妇人不慌不忙地抽出了一份打印好的卷轴，交给了婕伊。{/n}“这就是你的文件了，海达利女士。遗憾的是，这份文件目前并不具备法律效力，但只要在它上面盖上两个章，我就可以证明它是一份神圣的帝国官方行商执照。这些章很容易弄到，像这样的事务，内政部的机仆已经处理过150个年了。行商浪人在达戈努斯的宫殿里，就有一个负责盖章的机仆。而第二位负责盖章的机仆，则位于特里克斯·伊普西隆星系。”
languages.original_text: {n}The old woman unhurriedly holds out a printed scroll to Jae.{/n} "Here is your document, Mistress Heydari. Unfortunately, it does not yet have legal force — I can certify it as a sacred Mercatum Tabula Officiale once it has received two seals of approval. They are easy to obtain — in the Imperium court Administratum servitors have been handling such tasks for over fifty years. There is one such servitor here on Dargonus in the Rogue Trader's palace. The second is duty-bound to keep the seal in the Telikos Epsilon System."

traits.locale_text: {n}老妇人不慌不忙地抽出了一份打印好的卷轴，交给了婕伊。{/n}“这就是你的文件了，海达利女士。遗憾的是，这份文件目前并不具备法律效力，但只要在它上面盖上两个章，我就可以证明它是一份神圣的帝国官方行商执照。这些章很容易弄到，像这样的事务，内政部的奴工已经处理过150个周期了。行商浪人在达戈努斯的宫殿里，就有一个负责盖章的奴工。而第二位负责盖章的奴工，则位于特里克斯·伊普西隆星系。”

languages.text: {n}La mujer entrega parsimoniosamente un pergamino impreso a Jae.{/n} «Aquí tiene el documento, señora Heydari. Lamentablemente, todavía no tiene validez legal. Podré certificarlo como una Mercatum Tabula Officiale sagrada una vez reciba dos sellos de aprobación. Son fáciles de obtener; los servidores del Administratum de la corte del Imperium llevan cincuenta años gestionando esta tarea. Uno de los servidores está aquí en Dargonus, en el palacio de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. El deber exige al segundo que vele por el sello en el sistema Telikos Epsilon».
languages.original_text: {n}The old woman unhurriedly holds out a printed scroll to Jae.{/n} "Here is your document, Mistress Heydari. Unfortunately, it does not yet have legal force — I can certify it as a sacred Mercatum Tabula Officiale once it has received two seals of approval. They are easy to obtain — in the Imperium court Administratum servitors have been handling such tasks for over fifty years. There is one such servitor here on Dargonus in the Rogue Trader's palace. The second is duty-bound to keep the seal in the Telikos Epsilon System."

traits.locale_text: {n}La mujer entrega parsimoniosamente un pergamino impreso a Jae.{/n} «Aquí tiene el documento, señora Heydari. Lamentablemente, todavía no tiene validez legal. Podré certificarlo como una Mercatum Tabula Officiale sagrada una vez reciba dos sellos de aprobación. Son fáciles de obtener; los servidores del Administratum de la corte del Imperium llevan 150 ciclos gestionando esta tarea. Uno de los servidores está aquí en Dargonus, en el palacio de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. El deber exige al segundo que vele por el sello en el sistema Telikos Epsilon».

languages.text: {n}老婦人は印刷済みの巻物を１本、ゆっくりとジェイへと差し出す。{/n}「こちらがあなたの書類です、ミストレス・ヘイダリ。残念ながら、まだ法的効力を発揮しておりません。こちらの書類に承認印をふたついただければ、神聖なるメルカトゥム・タビュラ・オフィシャルとして認証を出せます。承認印をもらう方法は簡単です。帝国法廷に行政局のサーヴィターたちが50年以上にわたってこうした職務を取り扱っていますからね。一体はダルゴナスでは自由開拓者の宮殿に、もう一体はティリコス・イプシロン・システムで印章保管義務を担っています」
languages.original_text: {n}The old woman unhurriedly holds out a printed scroll to Jae.{/n} "Here is your document, Mistress Heydari. Unfortunately, it does not yet have legal force — I can certify it as a sacred Mercatum Tabula Officiale once it has received two seals of approval. They are easy to obtain — in the Imperium court Administratum servitors have been handling such tasks for over fifty years. There is one such servitor here on Dargonus in the Rogue Trader's palace. The second is duty-bound to keep the seal in the Telikos Epsilon System."

traits.locale_text: {n}老婦人は印刷済みの巻物を１本、ゆっくりとジェイへと差し出す。{/n}「こちらがあなたの書類です、ミストレス・ヘイダリ。残念ながら、まだ法的効力を発揮しておりません。こちらの書類に承認印をふたついただければ、神聖なるメルカトゥム・タビュラ・オフィシャルとして認証を出せます。承認印をもらう方法は簡単です。帝国法廷に行政局のサーヴィターたちが50年以上にわたってこうした職務を取り扱っていますからね。一体はダルゴナスでは自由開拓者の宮殿に、もう一体はティリコス・イプシロン・システムで印章保管義務を担っています」

languages.text: {n}D'un geste lent, la vieille femme tend un parchemin à Jae.{/n} « Voici votre document, maîtresse Heydari. Malheureusement, il n'a pas encore de valeur juridique. Je ne pourrai le certifier officiellement que lorsque vous aurez obtenu les deux sceaux de conformité préconisés par la loi. Simple formalité. Les servitors administratifs de la cour impériale sont là pour ça, et ce depuis plus de cinquante ans. Vous trouverez le premier ici même, sur Dargonus, dans le palais {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. Quant au second, il est chargé de garder le sceau dans le système Telikos Epsilon. »
languages.original_text: {n}The old woman unhurriedly holds out a printed scroll to Jae.{/n} "Here is your document, Mistress Heydari. Unfortunately, it does not yet have legal force — I can certify it as a sacred Mercatum Tabula Officiale once it has received two seals of approval. They are easy to obtain — in the Imperium court Administratum servitors have been handling such tasks for over fifty years. There is one such servitor here on Dargonus in the Rogue Trader's palace. The second is duty-bound to keep the seal in the Telikos Epsilon System."

traits.locale_text: {n}D'un geste lent, la vieille femme tend un parchemin à Jae.{/n} « Voici votre document, maîtresse Heydari. Malheureusement, il n'a pas encore de valeur juridique. Je ne pourrai le certifier officiellement que lorsque vous aurez obtenu les deux sceaux de conformité préconisés par la loi. Simple formalité. Les servitors administratifs de la cour impériale sont là pour ça, et ce depuis plus de 150 cycles. Vous trouverez le premier ici même, sur Dargonus, dans le palais {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. Quant au second, il est chargé de garder le sceau dans le système Telikos Epsilon. »

languages.text: {n}Die alte Frau hält Jae seelenruhig eine bedruckte Schriftrolle entgegen.{/n} "Hier ist Euer Dokument, Herrin Heydari. Leider ist es noch nicht rechtskräftig – ich kann es erst als heiliges Mercatum Tabula Officiale zertifizieren, wenn es zwei Prüfsiegel aufweist. Sie zu erlangen, ist kein Problem – Administratum-Servitoren am Hofe des Imperiums machen seit über fünfzig Jahren nichts anderes. Einer der Servitoren befindet sich hier auf Dargonus, im Palast {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}. Der zweite hat die Pflicht, das Siegel im System Telikos Epsilon zu schützen."
languages.original_text: {n}The old woman unhurriedly holds out a printed scroll to Jae.{/n} "Here is your document, Mistress Heydari. Unfortunately, it does not yet have legal force — I can certify it as a sacred Mercatum Tabula Officiale once it has received two seals of approval. They are easy to obtain — in the Imperium court Administratum servitors have been handling such tasks for over fifty years. There is one such servitor here on Dargonus in the Rogue Trader's palace. The second is duty-bound to keep the seal in the Telikos Epsilon System."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die alte Frau hält Jae seelenruhig eine bedruckte Schriftrolle entgegen.{/n} "Hier ist Euer Dokument, Herrin Heydari. Leider ist es noch nicht rechtskräftig – ich kann es erst als heiliges Mercatum Tabula Officiale zertifizieren, wenn es zwei Prüfsiegel aufweist. Sie zu erlangen, ist kein Problem – Administratum-Servitoren am Hofe des Imperiums machen seit über 150 Zyklen nichts anderes. Einer der Servitoren befindet sich hier auf Dargonus, im Palast {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}. Der zweite hat die Pflicht, das Siegel im System Telikos Epsilon zu schützen."

languages.text: {n}Yaşlı kadın, yazdırılmış bir tomarı hiç acele etmeden Jae'a uzatıyor.{/n} "İşte belgeniz Üstat Heydari. Ne yazık ki henüz hiçbir yasal gücü yok... İki onay mührü basıldıktan sonra kutsal bir Mercatum Tabula Officiale olduğunu tasdik edebilirim. Bu mühürleri elde etmek zor iş değildir... İmparatorluk sarayındaki Administratum hizmetörleri, böylesi işleri elli yıldan uzun bir süredir hallediyor. Hür Tacir'in Dargonus'taki sarayında böyle bir hizmetör mevcut. İkincisi ise vazifesi gereği mührü Telikos Epsilon Sistemi'nde tutuyor."
languages.original_text: {n}The old woman unhurriedly holds out a printed scroll to Jae.{/n} "Here is your document, Mistress Heydari. Unfortunately, it does not yet have legal force — I can certify it as a sacred Mercatum Tabula Officiale once it has received two seals of approval. They are easy to obtain — in the Imperium court Administratum servitors have been handling such tasks for over fifty years. There is one such servitor here on Dargonus in the Rogue Trader's palace. The second is duty-bound to keep the seal in the Telikos Epsilon System."
